languages.text: "Но... но разве..." {n}Арджента раздосадованно взмахивает рукой, словно рубя воздух.{/n} "Твои упреки тяжелы, Вольный Торговец. Но полно. Нас ждет враг и святыня, которую надо защитить. Идем же!"

traits.locale_text: "Но... но разве..." {n}Арджента раздосадованно взмахивает рукой, словно рубя воздух.{/n} "Твои упреки тяжелы, Вольный торговец. Но полно. Нас ждет враг и святыня, которую надо защитить. Идем же!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"
languages.original_text: "Но... но разве..." {n}Арджента раздосадованно взмахивает рукой, словно рубя воздух.{/n} "Твои упреки тяжелы, Вольный Торговец. Но полно. Нас ждет враг и святыня, которую надо защитить. Идем же!"

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「だが…だが、我はてっきり…」{n}アルジェンタは落胆して、あたかも空を手で切るように手を振った。{/n}「随分と強く非難されるのですね、自由開拓者。だがミッションへ戻らなくては。敵が待っています。そして聖遺物も保護しなくてはならない。行きましょう！」
languages.original_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"

traits.locale_text: 「だが…だが、我はてっきり…」{n}アルジェンタは落胆して、あたかも空を手で切るように手を振った。{/n}「随分と強く非難されるのですね、自由開拓者。だがミッションへ戻らなくては。敵が待っています。そして聖遺物も保護しなくてはならない。行きましょう！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “可……可我以为……”{n}阿洁塔沮丧地挥着手，仿佛在切着空气一样。{/n}“你的斥责让我心头无比沉重，行商浪人。不过，我们得将注意力转回此行的使命上了。我们的敌人在等着我们，需要保护的圣物也在等着我们，快来吧！”
languages.original_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"

traits.locale_text: “可……可我以为……”{n}阿洁塔沮丧地挥着手，仿佛在切着空气一样。{/n}“你的斥责让我心头无比沉重，行商浪人。不过，我们得将注意力转回此行的使命上了。我们的敌人在等着我们，需要保护的圣物也在等着我们，快来吧！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Mais... Je croyais... » {n}Argenta balaie votre remarque d'un geste brusque et contrarié, comme si elle cherchait à trancher l'air de sa main.{/n} « Vos remontrances me peinent, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais notre mission passe avant tout. Notre ennemi nous attend, et il nous faut protéger cette relique. En route ! »
languages.original_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais... Je croyais... » {n}Argenta balaie votre remarque d'un geste brusque et contrarié, comme si elle cherchait à trancher l'air de sa main.{/n} « Vos remontrances me peinent, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais notre mission passe avant tout. Notre ennemi nous attend, et il nous faut protéger cette relique. En route ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Pero... Pensaba que...». {n}Argenta gesticula con frustración, cortando el aire con la mano.{/n} «Sus reproches son duros, Comerciante Independiente. Pero debemos volver a la misión. El enemigo espera, al igual que la reliquia que debo proteger. ¡Vamos!».
languages.original_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"

traits.locale_text: «Pero... Pensaba que...». {n}Argenta gesticula con frustración, cortando el aire con la mano.{/n} «Sus reproches son duros, Comerciante Independiente. Pero debemos volver a la misión. El enemigo espera, al igual que la reliquia que debo proteger. ¡Vamos!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Aber ... aber ich dachte ..." {n}Argenta macht eine frustrierte Handgeste, als würde sie die Luft durchschneiden.{/n} "Euer Tadel wiegt schwer, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber wir sollten zu unserer Mission zurückkehren. Unser Feind wartet, und ein Relikt muss beschützt werden. Kommt!"
languages.original_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber ... aber ich dachte ..." {n}Argenta macht eine frustrierte Handgeste, als würde sie die Luft durchschneiden.{/n} "Euer Tadel wiegt schwer, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber wir sollten zu unserer Mission zurückkehren. Unser Feind wartet, und ein Relikt muss beschützt werden. Kommt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ancak ben... Düşündüm ki..." {n}Argenta, havayı bölermişçesine öfkeyle elini sallıyor.{/n} "Sitemlerin oldukça ağır Hür Tacir... Şimdi görevimize devam etmeliyiz. Düşmanımız bizi bekliyor, yadigârın ise korunmaya ihtiyacı var. Hadi!"
languages.original_text: "But... But I thought..." {n}Argenta waves a hand in frustration, as if cutting through the air.{/n} "Your rebukes weigh heavily, Rogue Trader. But we should return to our mission. Our enemy awaits, and so does a relic in need of protection. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "Ancak ben... Düşündüm ki..." {n}Argenta, havayı bölermişçesine öfkeyle elini sallıyor.{/n} "Sitemlerin oldukça ağır Hür Tacir... Ancak görevimize devam etmeliyiz. Düşmanımız bizi beklerken yadigârın ise korunmaya ihtiyacı var. Hadi!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
